page.title: 04DAY IN THE LIFE OF J THOMAS
page.content: { My Day by Judith Thomas Aged 9 { { }I get up at 7.35. Dad makes us a drink then I dress and get my packed lunch. We go by car to Parklee School. The whistle goes and we line up. In school we do maths, then at 9.30 we watch Picture Box on T.V. Assembly is at 10.00 then it's playtime. At 11.00 we watch Zig Zag on T.V. Lunch time is at 12.00. We come in at 1.10 for P.E. After play we do punctuation cards. We have recorder lessons at 3.10 and home time is at 3.30. I walk to my nan's. She makes me coffee and I watch children's T.V. My mum comes for me and we have tea at home. Later mum takes me to brownies. I go home at 8.00, watch some T.V. then go to bed.
